annotation: Tang Kristensen finished the collecting session with these notations about local pronunciation. Margrete's unusual pronunciation of the word furrow, fonen (AMJ 2.20) triggers this observation. The contrasting remark, "Here in Mejlby...but in Skjødstrup" indicates that these may well be Margrete's comments and not simply Tang Kristensen's own observations.
danish_manuscript:
Her siger de Fonen (s: Furen) men i Skjødstr.
siger de Fåren.
english_manuscript: Here in Mejlby they say "fonen" (furen) [furrow], but in Skjødstrup, they say fåren.
danish_publication: Her (i Mejlby) siger de fonen (furen), men i Skjødstrup siger de fåren.
english_publication: Here (in Mejlby) they say “fonen” (furen), but in Skjødstrup, they say fåren.

etk_index.heading_english: Our forebears' way of thinking and spiritual life
